content.question: Which of the following is a solution to the differential equation <math alttext="x times y prime, minus, 3 y, equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="y equals, x squared, plus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 3 times x squared, minus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 5 times x cubed, minus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="y equals, 7 times x cubed, plus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="y equals, 5 times x cubed, minus 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
